name: Ricetta: insalata alla menta
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mint Salad.

value.name: Menta
value.desc: Un ingrediente rinfrescante che pu√≤ mitigare la piccantezza di molti piatti.

value.name: Peperoncino di Jueyun
value.desc: Un pianta piccante nativa di Liyue. Basta annusarlo per provare caldo e sete.

value.name: Insalata alla menta
value.desc: A fragrant salad dish. Finely chopped Jueyun Chilis blended with a sauce and mixed with Mint leaves. It looks like nothing special, but it has surprisingly potent powers of refreshment and reinvigoration. It is also the perfect palate-cleanser after a greasy, indulgent meal.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Chef Mao at Wanmin Restaurant</color>
